name: Ranger
explanation: Rangers are basically the D&D version of a hunter. In most cases they are depicted with a bow in hands and aiming at something.

name: Cleric
explanation: Clerics are a really complicated class due to their versatility. Theres pretty much nothing a cleric cant do, but you'll have to choose a certain path, which gives you certain abilities. They can channel the power of a deity, like if its a deity of light they can cast healing spells or if their deity is one of war they can cast more spells that make a lot of damage. Because there ae so many deities in the world of D&D, playing a cleric gives you a wide range

name: Paladin
explanation: Paldins are a class that is often depicted as the leader of a group and yes they can be great leaders, but it always depends on how the player actually plays them. Paladins are basically knights that have sworn a oath, that can be anything like " You shall only do harm to protect others." or " You shall never harm the innocent." As you can see a Paladins Oath is a kind of Guideline which they follow. In most cases its something righteous,
